name: Family Dinner (pansandpots)
description:
Finalist for the BAFTA YGD 2020 Game Making competition!

Family Dinner is an interactive-fiction game about being a closeted transgender teenager at a family dinner, and all the awkwardness and upset that entails.

Developed by: TomIf you want to support me, you can follow me on Twitter or on Twitch!
Or, join my game dev Discord @ https://discord.gg/pZ7wuG2

Playtime: 15-20 minutes
Content Warning: Instances of transphobia, distressing scenes
